段: 百姓社會e5幸福是在ti7身軀，精神，kap品德e5培養。愛百姓興旺著減少破病、貧窮、無覺、犯罪種種。
Peh-siN3 sia7-hoe7 e5 heng7-hok si7 chai7 ti7 seng-khu, cheng-sin5, kap phin2-tek e5 poe5-iuN2. Ai3 peh-siN3 heng-ong7 tioh8 kiam2-chio2 phoa3-piN7, pin5-kiong5, bu5-kak, hoan7-choe7 cheng2-cheng2.

論破病。病毒有真濟款，食酒e5人較無hit 個抵抗e5力，就較快染著破病。Ti7 英國有真濟病院。Bat toa3倫敦病院20冬久e5醫生，不止出名--e5，講hit 個病院年年所有e5 病人每100人有70人破病是為著酒精。伊koh講：「我 m7 是講hit 70人是醉漢。」可見伊所講e5若是實，就英國e5病院10間e5 7間是 m7 免，thang用hit 個費用來贊成國e5別項事，也thang免hiah-e5人e5艱苦。

Lun7 phoa3-piN7. PeN7-tok8 u7 chin che7 khoan2, chiah8 chiu2 e5 lang5 khah bo5 hit e5 ti2-khong3 e5 lat8, chiu7 khah khoai3 jiam2 tioh8 phoa3-piN7. Ti7 Eng-kok u7 chin che7 peN7-iN7. Bat toa3 Lun5-tun peN7-iN7 20 tang ku2 e5 i-seng, put-chi2 chhut-mia5--e5, kong2 hit e5 peN7-iN7 ni5-ni5 sou2 u7 e5 piN7 lang5 mui2 100 lang5 u7 70 lang5 phoa3-piN7 si7 ui7 tioh8 chiu2-cheng. I koh kong2: “Goa2 m7 si7 kong2 hit 70 lang5 si7 chui3-han3.” Kho2-kian3 i sou2 kong2--e5 na7 si7 sit8, chiu7 Eng-kok e5 peN7-iN7 10 keng e5 7 keng si7 m7 bian2, thang eng7 hit e5 hui3-iong7 lai5 chan3-seng5 kok e5 pat8 hang7 su7, ia7 thang bian2 hiah-e5 lang5 e5 kan-khou2.

Ti7 1903年有一間大間e5醫館，hiah-e5 帶肺癆病死e5人無一個無關係酒e5害；kiam2-chhai2是家己bat食，抑是tui3父母遺傳。Ti7 1905年ti7 法國e5巴黎城有聚集肺病e5萬國會議。In決議，「因為酒毒kap肺結核e5關聯，這個會致意擬定酒精e5毒，kap肺結核要緊著平平禁戒。」也有癌症 ( 毒瘤 ) 就是真可傷e5症頭；bat有校勘e5人講帶hit 個病死e5其中，有食淡薄酒e5比禁酒 e5人是重倍。

Ti7 1903 ni5 u7 chit8 keng toa7 keng e5 i-koan2, hiah-e5 tai3 hi3-lo5 peN7 si2 e5 lang5 bo5 chit8 e5 bo5 koan-he7 chiu2 e5 hai7; kiam2-chhai2 si7 ka-ti7 bat chiah8, a2 si7 tui3 pe7-bu2 ui5-thoan5. Ti7 1905 ni5 ti7 Hoat-kok e5 Pa-li2 siaN5 u7 chu7-chip8 Hi3-peN7 e5 Ban7-kok Hoe7-gi7. In koat-gi7, “In-ui7 chiu2-tok8 kap hi3-kiat-hut8 e5 koan-lian5, chit e5 Hoe7 ti3-i3 gi2-tiaN7 chiu2-cheng e5 tok8, kap hi3-kiat-hut8 iau3-kin2 tioh8 piN5-piN5 kim3-kai3.” Ia7 u7 gam5-cheng3 (tok8-liu5) chiu7-si7 chin kho2-siong e5 cheng3-thau5; bat u7 kau3-kham3 e5 lang5 kong2 tai3 hit e5 peN7 si2 e5 ki5-tiong, u7 chiah8 tam7-poh8 chiu2--e5 pi2 kim3-chiu2 e5 lang5 si7 teng5-poe7.

父母若食酒kiam2-chhai2會害伊e5 子較短壽。瑞士國一個醫生將15年e5統計，就是揀10口灶罕tit食酒e5人生子e5事kap 10口灶愛食酒醉--e5來相比。Ti7 hit 個期限無食酒e5生61個囡仔，其中50個生存，也無破相。愛酒醉--e5生57個囡仔只有10個生存無破相。Ti7 罕tit食酒hit 10口灶有6個子無齊全；ti7 愛食酒e5 hit 10口灶有22個無齊全，有e5 羊眩，有e5 痟云云。

Pe7-bu2 na7 chiah8 chiu2 kiam2-chhai2 e7 hai7 i e5 kiaN2 khah te2-siu7. Sui7-su7 kok chit8 e5 i-seng chiong 15 ni5 e5 thong2-ke3, chiu7-si7 keng2 10 khau2-chau3 han2-tit chiah8 chiu2 e5 lang5 siN kiaN2 e5 su7 kap 10 khau2-chau3 ai3 chiah8-chiu2-chui3--e5 lai5 saN pi2. Ti7 hit e5 ki5-han7 bo5 chiah8-chiu2--e5 siN 61 e5 gin2-na2, ki5-tiong 50 e5 seng-chun5, ia7 bo5 phoa3-siuN3. Ai3 chiu2-chui3--e5 siN 57 e5 gin2-na2 chi2-u7 10 e5 seng-chun5 bo5 phoa3-siuN3. Ti7 han2-tit chiah8-chiu2 hit 10 khau2-chau3 u7 6 e5 kiaN2 bo5 chiau5-chng5, ti7 ai3 chiah8-chiu2--e5 hit 10 khau2-chau3 u7 22 e5 bo5 chiau5-chng5, u7-e5 iuN5-hin5, u7-e5 siau2 un5-un5.
論失心hit號病也是an2-ni。瘋癲病院e5院長bat講失心100人 ( 查甫 ) e5 內中，35至40個是為著酒才失心，kiam2-chhai2是對家己，抑是對別人連累。

Lun7 sit-sim hit ho7 peN7 ia7 si7 an2-ni. Hong-tian peN7-iN7 e5 iN7-tiuN2 bat kong2 sit-sim 100 lang5(ta-pou) e5 lai7-tiong, 35 chi3 40 e5 si7 ui7 tioh8 chiu2 chiah sit-sim, kiam2-chhai2 si7 tui3 ka-ti7, a2 si7 tui3 pat8 lang5 lian5-lui7.
今酒精是甚物？怎樣hiah損害？一項：酒精是屬ti7 麻醉藥e5類，若食就會中毒。Hit號e5物會hou7人暫時勇敢，不止得意，但是久長憂鬱。鴉片是毒，酒精也是毒；若用che，健康be7免得損失。

TaN chiu2-cheng si7 sim2-mih8? ChaiN2-iuN7 hiah sun2-hai7? Chit8 hang7: chiu2-cheng si7 siok8 ti7 ba5-chui3 ioh8 e5 lui7, na7 chiah8 chiu7 e7 tiong3-tok8. Hit ho7 e5 mih8 e7 hou7 lang5 chiam7-si5 iong2-kam2, put-chi2 tek-i3, na7 si7 ku2-tng5 iu-ut. A-phian3 si7 tok8, chiu2-cheng ia7 si7 tok8; na7 eng7 che, kian7-khong be7 bian2-tit sun2-sit.
Koh一項：酒精會生起gian3，食了愛koh加添。Kan-ta這項是夠額thang hou7人驚。
Koh chit8 hang7: chiu2-cheng e7 siN khi2 gian3, chiah8 liau2 ai3 koh ke-thiN. Kan-ta chit hang7 si7 kau3-giah8 thang hou7 lang5 kiaN.
前較濟人扑算食濟是 m7 好，食淡薄是好。到今已經較知影。Ti7 倫敦城第一大e5病院幾若間這50年內所用e5酒大減少，所用e5牛乳大加添。現時ti7 hia 開酒e5費將50年前對比m7上7份e5一份。有歐羅巴一國e5百姓開酒e5費每年一人平均Y60，總是ti7 病院內一人平均只有5角。

Cheng5 khah che7 lang5 phah-sng3 chiah8 che7 si7 m7 ho2, chiah8 tam7-poh8 si7 ho2. Kau3 taN i2-keng khah chai-iaN2. Ti7 Lun5-tun siaN5 te7 it toa7 e5 peN7-iN7 kui2-na7 keng chit 50 ni5 lai7 sou2 eng7 e5 chiu2 toa7 kiam2-chio2, sou2 eng7 e5 gu5-leng toa7 ke-thiN. Hian7-si5 ti7 hia khai chiu2 e5 hui3 chiong 50 ni5 cheng5 tui3-pi2 m7 chiuN7 chhit hun7 e5 chit8 hun7. U7 Au-lo5-pa chit8 kok e5 peh-siN3 khai chiu2 e5 hui3 mui2 ni5 chit8 lang5 peng5-kin Y60, chong2-si7 ti7 peN7-iN7 lai7 chit8 lang5 peng5-kin chi2-u7 5 kak.
Koh論外科醫也是an2-ni。早時著hou7 病人食淡薄酒，就向望較有力thang擔當手術e5艱苦。現今反轉勸伊 m7-thang食酒，因為血內若有酒精就逐號e5傷較oh醫治。

Koh lun7 goa7-kho-i ia7 si7 an2-ni. Cha2-si5 tioh8 hou7 peN7 lang5 chiah8 tam7-poh8 chiu2, chiu7 ng3-bang7 khah u7 lat8 thang tam-tng chhiu2-sut8 e5 kan-khou2. Hian7-kim hoan2-tng2 khng3 i m7-thang chiah8 chiu2, in-ui7 hoeh lai7 na7 u7 chiu2-cheng chiu7 tak8 ho7 e5 siong khah oh i-ti7.

幾若十年前一位醫生寫批hou7 伊e5 朋友講：「你若beh食淡薄酒，著認這個物是奢侈，也著出hit 個價值。較常hit個價值是淡薄失落健康，抑是智慧，抑是好性情hit號。」伊所講e5今過濟濟試驗thang知是有影。酒an3怎樣無利益身軀，頂月也有講。Iau2有幾若項thang想。Ti7 西國有真濟生命保險會社；看in e5總計就知禁酒家比無禁e5平均有較長歲壽，koh有e5 准禁酒e5人出保險料比無禁酒e5較少。M7-na7 an2-ni；賣酒e5商業家in beh去保險，所著納e5錢比別人較重，又koh保險會社有e5 m7 收伊。Che是因為in死亡e5數額比別人較濟。Ti7 瑞士國每年死e5 100查甫人10個是為著酒精。意思就是in所有e5 病親像屬ti7 肺、抑是肝，抑是神經系統，hit個原因是對食酒。

Kui2-na7 chap8 ni5 cheng5 chit8 ui7 i-seng sia2 phoe hou7 i e5 peng5-iu2 kong2: “Li2 na7 beh chiah8 tam7-poh8 chiu2, tioh8 jin7 chit e5 mih8 si7 chhia-chhi2,ia7 tioh8 chhut hit e5 ke3-tat8. Khah siong5 hit e5 ke3-tat8 si7 tam7-poh8 sit-loh8 kian7-khong, a2 si7 ti3-hui7, a2 si7 ho2 seng3-cheng5 hit ho7.” I sou2 kong2--e5 taN koe3 che7-che7 chhi3-giam7 thang chai si7 u7 iaN2. Chiu2 an3-chaiN2-iuN7 bo5 li7-ek seng-khu, teng2 goeh8 ia7 u7 kong2. Iau2 u7 kui2-na7 hang7 thang siuN7. Ti7 Se-kok u7 chin che7 Seng-beng7 Po2-hiam2 Hoe7-sia7; khoaN3 in e5 chong2-ke3 chiu7 chai kim3-chiu2-ka pi2 bo5 kim3--e5 peng5-kin u7 khah tng5 hoe3-siu7, koh u7-e5 chun2 kim3-chiu2 e5 lang5 chhut po2-hiam2-liau7 pi2 bo5 kim3-chiu2--e5 khah chio2. M7-na7 an2-ni; be7 chiu2 e5 siong-giap8-ka in beh khi3 po2-hiam2, sou2 tioh8 lap8 e5 chiN5 pi2 pat8 lang5 khah tang7, iu7-koh po2-hiam2 hoe7-sia7 u7-e5 m7 siu i. Che si7 in-ui7 in si2-bong5 e5 siau3-giah8 pi2 pat8 lang5 khah che7. Ti7 Sui7-su7 kok mui2 ni5 si2 e5 100 ta-pou-lang5 10 e5 si7 ui7 tioh8 chiu2-cheng. I3-su3 chiu7-si7 in sou2 u7 e5 piN7 chhin-chhiuN7 siok8 ti7 hi3, a2 si7 koaN, a2 si7 sin5-keng he7-thong2, hit e5 goan5-in si7 tui3 chiah8 chiu2.
囡仔早死真濟也是因為父母食酒。做老母e5人m7-thang錯誤；in若teh食酒就hit 個飼子e5乳會較少也較無滋養，致到嬰仔有損害。酒也會搶奪人疼子e5心。有濟濟趁食人用逐禮拜e5薪勞6分e5一份來食酒，也其餘e5著做夠額thang買家己kap婦人人以及幾若個囡仔e5米糧、衣裳，kap稅厝等等e5所費。Koh有偌濟家為著老父食酒才狼狽，che算be7了。

Gin2-na2 cha2-si2 chin che7 ia7 si7 in-ui7 pe7-bu2 chiah8 chiu2. Cho3 lau7-bu2 e5 lang5 m7-thang chho3-gou7; in na7 teh chiah8 chiu2 chiu7 hit e5 chhi7 kiaN2 e5 leng e7 khah chio2 ia7 khah bo5 chu-iong2, ti3-kau3 eN-a2 u7 sun2-hai7. Chiu2 ia7 e7 chhiuN2-toat8 lang5 thiaN3 kiaN2 e5 sim. U7 che7-che7 than3-chiah8 lang5 eng7 tak8 le2-pai3 e5 sin-lo5 lak8 hun7 e5 chit8 hun7 lai5 chiah8 chiu2, ia7 ki5-u5-e5 tioh8 cho3 kau3-giah8 thang be2 ka-ti7 kap hu7-jin5 lang5 i2-kip8 kui2-na7 e5 gin2-na2 e5 bi2-niu5, i-chiuN5, kap soe3 chhu3 teng2-teng2 e5 sou2-hui3. Koh u7 loa7 che7 ke ui7 tioh8 lau7-pe7 chiah8 chiu2 chiah liong5-poe7, che sng3 be7 liau2.

人食酒 m7 若是較快破病，koh伊所做e5工也較m7 成物。連食淡薄也會hou7 伊e5 筋力較少。Bat有兩隊e5兵做粗工趁錢來比較：一隊iau2-boe7做起代先食麥仔酒，一隊無食酒。代先食麥仔酒hit一隊起頭真活動出力，但是較停sian7-sian7；到e5昏所做成e5工cham2然較輸別隊e5。後擺koh試看：hit個第二隊代先食麥仔酒，hit個食麥仔酒--e5今無食。所tu2著e5 tu2相像：食麥酒hiah-e5 到e5昏be7比得。

Lang5 chiah8 chiu2 m7-na7 si7 khah khoai3 phoa3-piN7, koh i sou2 cho3 e5 kang ia7 khah m7 chiaN5 mih8. Lian5 chiah8 tam7-poh8 ia7 e7 hou7 i e5 kin-lat8 khah chio2. Bat u7 nng7 tui7 e5 peng cho3 chhou kang than3 chiN5 lai5 pi2-kau3: chit8 tui7 iau2-boe7 cho3 khi2 tai7-seng chiah8 beh8-a2-chiu2, chit8 tui7 bo5 chiah8 chiu2. Tai7-seng chiah8 beh8-a2-chiu2 hit chit8 tui7 khi2-thau5 chin oah8-tang7 chhut-lat8, na7 si7 khah theng5 sian7-sian7; kau3 e5-hng sou2 cho3-chiaN5 e5 kang cham2-jian5 khah su pat8 tui7--e5. Au7 pai2 koh chhi3-khoaN3: hit e5 te7-ji7 tui7 tai7-seng chiah8 beh8-a2-chiu2, hit e5 chiah8 beh8-a2-chiu2--e5 taN bo5 chiah8. Sou2 tu2--tioh8-e5 tu2 sio-siang7: chiah8 beh8-chiu2 hiah-e5 kau3 e5-hng be7 pi2-tit.
有一個蘇格蘭e5好額人( Carnegie ) ti7 伊e5 所在倩真濟做工人。伊teh倩工有定著e5規矩，就是見有禁酒e5伊e5 薪勞比無禁e5加十份一。因為伊講禁酒e5所做e5工是較值。

U7 chit8 e5 Sou-kek-lan5 e5 ho2-giah8 lang5 (Carnegie) ti7 i e5 sou2-chai7 chhiaN3 chin che7 cho3 kang lang5. I teh chhiaN3 kang u7 tiaN7-tioh8 e5 kui-ki2, chiu7-si7 kian3 u7 kim3-chiu2--e5 i e5 sin-lo5 pi2 bo5 kim3--e5 ke chap8 hun7 chit8. In-ui7 i kong2 kim3-chiu2--e5 sou2 cho3 e5 kang si7 khah tat8.

M7 若做平常e5工，koh beh擔當非常e5忍耐也是an2-ni。親像探險新地，抑是運動e5人，也著禁酒。探險南北寒道e5人著經過非常長長e5枵餓寒kap厭sian7。有時因為霜雪e5地歹行，一日盡力只有行舖外路na7-tiaN7。Koh所有e5日食攏是家己帶去e5，也有定著e5額，特別e5款，第一滋養，第一會hou7 身軀燒lo7-e5。總是in攏無帶酒，che是an3怎樣？酒kiam2 be7會hou7 人燒lo7 koh活動mah？In較知：食酒hit號e5 燒lo7 會變做冷，hit號e5活動會變做無力。

M7-na7 cho3 peng5-siong5 e5 kang, koh beh tam-tng hui-siong5 e5 jim2-nai7 ia7 si7 an2-ni. Chhin-chhiuN7 tham3-hiam2 sin te7, a2 si7 un7-tong7 e5 lang5, ia7 tioh8 kim3 chiu2. Tham3-hiam2 Lam5 Pak Han5-to7 e5 lang5 tioh8 keng-koe3 hui-siong5 tng5-tng5 e5 iau-go7 koaN5 kap ia3-sian7. U7 si5 in-ui7 sng-seh e5 te7 phaiN2 kiaN5, chit8 jit8 chin7 lat8 chi2-u7 kiaN5 phou3-goa7 lou7 na7-tiaN7. Koh sou2 u7 e5 jit8-sit8 long2 si7 ka-ti7 toa3--khi3-e5, ia7 u7 tiaN7-tioh8 e5 giah8, tek8-piat8 e5 khoan2, te7 it chu-iong2, te7 it e7 hou7 seng-khu sio-lo7--e5. Chong2-si7 in long2 bo5 toa3 chiu2, che si7 an3-chaiN2-iuN7? Chiu2 kiam2 be7-e7 hou7 lang5 sio-lo7 koh oah8-tang7 mah? In khah chai: chiah8 chiu2 hit ho7 e5 sio-lo7 e7 piN3 cho3 leng2, hit ho7 e5 oah8-tang7 e7 piN3 cho3 bo5 lat8.
人m7 若ai3身軀勇健，koh ai3有精神gau5想。總是有一個醫生講：「人若hou7酒精感著，就家己e5五官be7倚靠tit。」近來有teh試腦力e5代誌。受試驗e5人有e5 食酒 ( 有一兩較加e5酒精ti7--teh )，有e5 攏無食。考了攏有錯ti7--teh，總是見若無食酒e5人若算100個錯，食酒e5就有153個錯。

Lang5 m7-na7 ai3 seng-khu iong2-kiaN7, koh ai3 u7 cheng-sin5 gau5 siuN7. Chong2-si7 u7 chit8 e5 i-seng kong2: “Lang5 na7 hou7 chiu2-cheng kam2 tioh8, chiu7 ka-ti7 e5 ngou2-koan be7 oa2-kho3 tit.” Kin7-lai5 u7 teh chhi3 nau2-lat8 e5 tai7-chi3. Siu7 chhi3-giam7 e5 lang5 u7-e5 chiah8 chiu2 (u7 chit8 niu2 khah ke e5 chiu2-cheng ti7--teh), u7-e5 long2 bo5 chiah8. Kho2 liau2 long2 u7 chho3 ti7--teh, chong2-si7 kiN3-na7 bo5 chiah8 chiu2 e5 lang5 na7 sng3 100 e5 chho3, chiah8-chiu2--e5 chiu7 u7 153 e5 chho3.

食酒e5真快錯誤，真快hou7 人設。若愛lau3人講出隱密e5代誌，家己e5抑是別人e5，kan-ta用酒請伊，就較常hit個隱密e5事攏拚出hou7 人知。親像下底所記幾若個實事是表明這個意思。Bat有一個強國kap一個小國teh交戰，hit個強國e5兵tauh8-tauh8陷落ti7 小國e5羅網。後來有人問大國一個兵講thai2 hit個小國hiah gau5 騙--in；伊kan-ta應一句講，「小國e5兵無食酒。」

Chiah8-chiu2--e5 chin khoai3 chho3-gou7, chin khoai3 hou7 lang5 siat . Na7 ai3 lau3 lang5 kong2 chhut un2-bat8 e5 tai7-chi3, ka-ti7 e5 a2 si7 pat8-lang5 e5, kan-ta eng7 chiu2 chhiaN2 i, chiu7 khah siong5 hit e5 un2-bat8 e5 su7 long2 piaN3 chhut hou7 lang5 chai. Chhin-chhiuN7 e7-te2 sou2 ki3 kui2-na7 e5 sit8-su7 si7 piau2-beng5 chit e5 i3-su3. Bat u7 chit8 e5 kiong5 kok kap chit8 e5 sio2 kok teh kau-chian3, hit e5 kiong5 kok e5 peng tauh8-tauh8 ham7 loh8 ti7 sio2 kok e5 lo5-bang7. Au7-lai5 u7 lang5 mng7 toa7 kok chit8 e5 peng kong2 thai2 hit e5 sio2 kok hiah gau5 phian3 in; i kan-ta in3 chit8 ku3 kong2, “Sio2 kok e5 peng bo5 chiah8 chiu2.”

舊年ti7 後山有一個人，對觀音山這爿去到Phoh-sit-koh hit爿辦代誌；著過幾若條溪，koh是落雨天。轉來e5 時，人已經酒醉；到溪底e5沙埔厭sian7，ti7 hia倒teh睏。茫茫 m7 知出溪流。Beh暗e5 時伊hou7 水圍teh就醒，hit時水liam5-piN 漲滿。親人知伊iau2-boe7倒來，就kiah8火把去chhoe7。到溪邊伊e5 子就聽著老父e5聲，teh叫「救命！救命！企be7 tiau5 lah ！」總是be7 赴，無法度。Hit個艱苦人，今知危險，精神迫切求叫，到忽然無聽見聲，就知hou7 水流去。

Ku7-ni5 ti7 Au7-soaN u7 chit8 e5 lang5, tui3 Koan-im-soaN chit peng5 khi3 kau3 Phoh-sit-koh hit peng5 pan7 tai7-chi3; tioh8 koe3 kui2-na7 tiau5 khe, koh si7 loh8-hou7 thiN. Tng2--lai5 e5 si5, lang5 i2-keng chiu2-chui3; kau3 khe-te2 e5 soa-pou ia3-sian7, ti7 hia to2 teh khun3. Bang5-bang5 m7 chai chhut khe-lau5. Beh am3 e5 si5 i hou7 chui2 ui5 teh chiu7 chhiN2, hit-si5 chui2 liam5-piN tiong3 moa2. Chhin-lang5 chai i iau2-boe7 to3--lai5, chiu7 kiah8 hoe2-pe2 khi3 chhoe7. Kau3 khe-piN i e5 kiaN2 chiu7 thiaN tioh8 lau7-pe7 e5 siaN, teh kio3 “Kiu3 mia7! kiu3 mia7! khia7 be7 tiau5 lah!” Chong2-si7 be7 hu3, bo5 hoat-tou7. Hit e5 kan-khou2 lang5, taN chai gui5-hiam2, cheng-sin5 pek-chhiat kiu5-kio3, kau3 hut-jian5 bo5 thiaN-kiN3 siaN, chiu7 chai hou7 chui2 lau5 khi3.

Ti7 後山有所在生番iau2-boe7投降，iau2真好膽，所以ti7山腳設隘勇寮來巡視。有時連hiah-e5警察續 hou7生番thai5死；聽人講濟濟擺是因為警察有食酒醉無持防才an2-ni。因為食酒會hou7 人hiah-nih8 m7 知危險，koh be7曉持防，所以美國e5大鐵道部較濟m7 倩無禁酒e5人ti7 hia做工。頂面hit位醫生所講e5是著：對酒會失落健康kap智慧，就是。

Ti7 Au7-soaN u7 sou2-chai7 chhiN-hoan iau2-boe7 tau5-hang5, iau2 chin ho2-taN2, sou2-i2 ti7 soaN-kha siat ai3-iong2-liau5 lai5 sun5-si7. U7 si5 lian5 hiah-e5 keng2-chhat soa3 hou7 chhiN-hoan thai5-si2; thiaN lang5 kong2 che7-che7 pai2 si7 in-ui7 keng2-chhat u7 chiah8 chiu2-chui3 bo5 ti5-hong5 chiah an2-ni. In-ui7 chiah8 chiu2 e7 hou7 lang5 hiah-nih8 m7 chai gui5-hiam2, koh be7 hiau2 ti5-hong5, sou2-i2 Bi2-kok e5 toa7 thih-to7-pou7 khah che7 m7 chhiaN3 bo5 kim3-chiu2 e5 lang5 ti7 hia cho3 kang. Teng2-bin7 hit ui7 i-seng sou2 kong2--e5 si7 tioh8: tui3 chiu2 e7 sit-loh8 kian7-khong kap ti3-hui7, chiu7-si7.
論品德，差不多 m7 免講。咱大家知醉漢--e5 愛變憨、相扑、開錢、m7 愛做工。Ti7 英國有一個官做辯護士40年，做判官10年久，ti7 1909年伊講本國每100個定罪e5人90個是為著酒e5害才犯著國法。

Lun7 phin2-tek, chha-put-to m7 bian2 kong2. Lan2 tai7-ke chai chui3-han3--e5 ai3 piN3 gong7, saN phah, khai chiN5, m7 ai3 cho3 kang. Ti7 Eng-kok u7 chit8 e5 koaN cho3 pian7-hou7-su7 40 ni5, cho3 phoaN3-koaN 10 ni5 ku2, ti7 1909 ni5 i kong2 pun2-kok mui2 100 e5 teng7-choe7 e5 lang5 90 e5 si7 ui7 tioh8 chiu2 e5 hai7 chiah hoan7 tioh8 kok-hoat.

百姓e5貧窮濟濟也是對酒。近來俄羅斯所經過e5事大家kaN2知。本然in e5百姓真濟 m7 bat字，做工艱苦，天氣寒，只有一項thang hou7 in歡喜，就是去酒店鬧熱e5所在食酒，那食那愛食，所以真oh改良。In e5酒號做vodka。十外年前政府得著專賣權，總是皇帝bat講用hit號hou7 百姓受害e5代誌來hou7 國家長錢是無合宜。後來起交戰，皇帝就出詔一盡禁人賣vodka。今an3-chaiN2-iuN7？用teh交戰e5 5月日kap boe7交戰e5 5月日來相比，就知當交戰e5 時百姓所寄銀行e5儲畜銀加添15倍較加。Koh俄國大藏大臣也干證講，今社會逐頂號e5好事cham2然振興，犯罪大減少。

Peh-siN3 e5 pin5-kiong5 che7-che7 ia7 si7 tui3 chiu2. Kin7-lai5 Gou5-lo5-su sou2 keng-koe3 e5 su7 tai7-ke kaN2 chai. Pun2-jian5 in e5 peh-siN3 chin che7 m7 bat ji7, cho3 kang kan-khou2, thiN-khi3 koaN5, chi2-u7 chit8 hang7 thang hou7 in hoaN-hi2, chiu7-si7 khi3 chiu2-tiam3 lau7-jiat8 e5 sou2-chai7 chiah8-chiu2, na2 chiah8 na2 ai3 chiah8, sou2-i2 chin oh kai2-liong5. In e5 chiu2 ho7 cho3 vodka. Chap8 goa7 ni5 cheng5 Cheng3-hu2 tit tioh8 choan-be7 koan5, chong2-si7 Hong5-te3 bat kong2 eng7 hit ho7 hou7 peh-siN3 siu7 hai7 e5 tai7-chi3 lai5 hou7 kok-ka tiong5-chiN5 si7 bo5 hap8-gi5. Au7-lai5 khi2 kau-chian3, Hong5-te3 chiu7 chhut chiau3 it-chin7 kim3 lang5 be7 vodka. TaN an3-chaiN2-iuN7? Eng7 teh kau-chian3 e5 5 goeh8 jit8 kap boe7 kau-chian3 e5 5 goeh8 jit8 lai5 saN-pi2, chiu7 chai tng kau-chian3 e5 si5 peh-siN3 sou2 kia3 gin5-hang5 e5 thu5-thiok gin5 ke-thiN 15 poe7 khah ke. Koh Gou5-kok Tai7-chong5 Tai7-sin5 ia7 kan-cheng3 kong2, taN sia7-hoe7 tak8 teng2-ho7 e5 ho2-su7 cham2-jian5 chin2-heng, hoan7-choe7 toa7 kiam2-chio2.

頂面夠額thang hou7 咱知食酒e5無路用。Koh再三思一擺。酒be7會做得米糧，反轉會hou7 食物較be7消，koh若製造酒就應該做米糧e5物，親像麥kap米hit號，續變做毒。酒所hou7人e5氣力kap燒lo7 是暫時。酒會扑歹人e5好品行，會hou7 人kan-ta疼家己，出在某子餓死，伊決斷beh食酒。酒hou7 人犯罪。酒teh騙人，人去酒店是愛鬧熱好thit-tho5，也無扑算到尾kiam2-chhai2無半圓，只有賣酒e5人對伊大好額na7-tiaN7。

Teng2-bin7 kau3-giah8 thang hou7 lan2 chai chiah8 chiu2 e5 bo5 lou7-eng7. Koh-chai3 sam-su chit8 pai2. Chiu2 be7-e7 cho3 tit bi2-niu5, hoan2-tng2 e7 hou7 chiah8-mih8 khah be7 siau, koh na7 che3-cho7 chiu2 chiu7 eng-kai cho3 bi2-niu5 e5 mih8, chhin-chhiuN7 beh8 kap bi2 hit-ho7, soa3 piN3 cho3 tok8. Chiu2 sou2 hou7 lang5 e5 khui3-lat8 kap sio-lo7 si7 chiam7-si5. Chiu2 e7 phah-phaiN2 lang5 e5 ho2 phin2-heng7, e7 hou7 lang5 kan-ta thiaN3 ka-ti7, chhut-chai7 bou2 kiaN2 go7-si2, i koat-toan3 beh chiah8 chiu2. Chiu2 hou7 lang5 hoan7-choe7. Chiu2 teh phian3 lang5, lang5 khi3 chiu2-tiam3 si7 ai3 lau7-jiat8 ho2 thit-tho5, ia7 bo5 phah-sng3 kau3 boe2 kiam2-chhai2 bo5 poaN3 iN5, chi2-u7 be7 chiu2 e5 lang5 tui3 i toa7 ho2-giah8 na7-tiaN7.
若果然是an2-ni，列國e5政府thai2 m7 攏親像俄國hit款？Thai2有hiah濟人teh賣酒，連教會內e5也有？Thai2有hiah濟好人iau2 teh食酒？有幾若項e5因端：政府 m7 辦因為是忌剋hiah-e5真好額e5製酒家 m7 愛得罪in。人teh賣是因為這途差不多第一好趁錢。

Na7 ko2-jian5 si7 an2-ni, liat8-kok e5 cheng3-hu2 thai2 m7 long2 chhin-chhiuN7 Gou5-kok hit khoan2? Thai2 u7 hiah che7 lang5 teh be7 chiu2, lian5 kau3-hoe7 lai7--e5 ia7 u7? Thai2 u7 hiah che7 ho2 lang5 iau2 teh chiah8 chiu2? U7 kui2-na7 hang7 e5 in-toaN: Cheng3-hu2 m7 pan7 in-ui7 si7 khi7-khek hiah-e5 chin ho2-giah8 e5 che3-chiu2-ka m7 ai3 tek-choe7 in. Lang5 teh be7 si7 in-ui7 chit tou5 chha-put-to te7-it ho2 than3 chiN5.

人iau2 teh食，有e5 是愛趁私慾，有e5 是因為趁風俗慣勢，koh無致意想hit 個危險，家己講是食淡薄na7-tiaN7。總是咱大家若略仔有致意頂面所記e5就thang知，若除去酒精e5效果，就世界e5醫館，瘋癲病院，孤兒院kap監獄濟濟免用；世間人e5福氣會加添到be7算tit。Ti7 這個代誌kiam2 m7 是咱hou7 主救e5人著出頭來chhoa7路？Kiam2是beh聽候歹風俗家己改換mah？

Lang5 iau2 teh chiah8, u7-e5 si7 ai3 than3 su-iok8, u7-e5 si7 in-ui7 than3 hong-siok8 koan3-si3, koh bo5 ti3-i3 siuN7 hit e5 gui5-hiam2, ka-ti7 kong2 si7 chiah8 tam7-poh8 na7-tiaN7. Chong2-si7 lan2 tai7-ke na7 lioh8-a2 u7 ti3-i3 teng2-bin7 sou2 ki3--e5 chiu7 thang chai, na7 tu5-khi3 chiu2-cheng e5 hau7-ko2, chiu7 se3-kai3 e5 i-koan2, hong-tian piN7-iN7, kou-ji5-iN7 kap kaN-gak8 che7-che7 bian2 eng7; se3-kan lang5 e5 hok-khi3 e7 ke-thiN kau3 be7 sng3-tit. Ti7 chit e5 tai7-chi3 kiam2 m7 si7 lan2 hou7 Chu2 kiu3 e5 lang5 tioh8 chhut-thau5 lai5 chhoa7 lou7? Kiam2 si7 beh theng3-hau7 phaiN2 hong-siok8 ka-ti7 ke2-oaN7 mah?
也有好人推辭講：「救主bat用水變做酒，所以咱 m7-thang禁酒。」Che是有影；也酒ti7 舊約是指歡喜 ( 詩篇104：15 )。M7-ku2逐國有伊e5境況，也bat有講hit時猶太人大半無過頭重酒，又koh這路尾世代製造真濟款e5酒比早時較厲害。

Ia7 u7 ho2-lang5 thui-si5 kong2: “Kiu3-chu2 bat iong7 chui2 pian3-choe3 chiu2, sou2-i2 lan2 m7-thang kim3-chiu2.” Che si7 u7-iaN2; ia7 chiu2 ti7 Ku7-iok si7 chi2 hoaN-hi2 (Si-phian 104:15). M7-ku2 tak8-kok u7 i e5 keng2-hong2, ia7 bat u7 kong2 hit-si5 Iu5-thai3-lang5 toa7-poaN3 bo5 koe3-thau5 tiong7 chiu2, iu7 koh chit lou7-boe2 se3-tai7 che3-cho7 chin che7 khoan2 e5 chiu2 pi2 cha2-si5 khah li7-hai7.
Koh有人講保羅有苦勸提摩太「著用淡薄酒」。Che是有影，會hou7 咱知提摩太本無teh食酒。保羅koh講，「因為你e5 脾胃，kap你e5 厚破病e5緣故。」提摩太是lam2身也hit時敢無親像現時有hiah濟款e5補劑thang用。總是愛看聖冊所干涉食酒e5意思，m7-na7有chiah-e5；後月kiam2-chhai2 beh koh記。

Koh u7 lang5 kong2 Po2-lo5 u7 khou2-khng3 The5-mou5-thai3 “tioh8 eng7 tam7-poh8 chiu2”. Che si7 u7 iaN2, e7 hou7 lan2 chai The5-mou5-thai3 pun2 bo5 teh chiah8 chiu2. Po2-lo5 koh kong2, “In-ui7 li2 e5 pi5-ui7, kap li2 e5 kau7 phoa3-piN7 e5 ian5-kou3.” The5-mou5-thai3 si7 lam2-sin ia7 hit-si5 kaN2 bo5 chhin-chhiuN7 hian7-si5 u7 hiah che7 khoan2 e5 pou2-che thang eng7. Chong2-si7 ai3 khoaN3 Seng3-chheh sou2 kan-siap8 chiah8 chiu2 e5 i3-su3, m7-na7 u7 chiah-e5; au7 goeh8 kiam2-chhai2 beh koh ki3.

Tui3 hit號 m7 知危險e5人愛講一個實事：Ti7 少年朋友e5中間，有一個略仔有錢e5人，好心無甚物 thang嫌。Ti7 in厝逐日食飯e5時慣勢續食淡薄酒，論食傷濟he m7 bat。到後來tu2著較冷靜無伴，續用酒做朋友。食了心較歡喜。無扑算漸漸hou7酒做主，到別日癮到擋be7 tiau5。親人ka7伊禁；去toa3 ti7 朋友兜，朋友ka7伊禁。總是伊su-khia帶入來。一暝朋友鼻著臭火烙，就chong5入伊e5睏房，看伊ti7 火爐邊hou7 火燒，m7 知伊所做。好佳哉hit擺hou7 人救。就koh倒去親人兜。親人koh ka7伊禁酒，伊艱苦到極。有一日kap親人teh行路，就閃續跳落倫敦河死。倚40歲na7-tiaN7。你teh講：我永m7 做醉漢。無的確知。這項thang知，就是hit個人若攏無食酒，就伊 m7 免做醉漢死，che是有影。

Tui3 hit ho7 m7 chai gui5-hiam2 e5 lang5 ai3 kong2 chit8 e5 sit8-su7: Ti7 siau3-lian5 peng5-iu2 e5 tiong-kan, u7 chit8 e5 lioh8-a2 u7 chiN5 e5 lang5, ho2-sim bo5 sim2-mih8 thang hiam5. Ti7 in chhu3 tak8 jit8 chiah8 png7 e5 si5 koan3-si3 soa3 chiah8 tam7-poh8 chiu2, lun7 chiah8 siuN che7 he m7 bat. Kau3 au7-lai5 tu2 tioh8 khah leng2-cheng7 bo5 phoaN7, soa3 eng7 chiu2 cho3 peng5-iu2. Chiah8 liau2 sim khah hoaN-hi2. Bo5 phah-sng3 chiam7-chiam7 hou7 chiu2 cho3 chu2, kau3 pat8-jit8 gian3 kau3 tong3 be7 tiau5. Chhin-lang5 ka7 i kim3; khi3 toa3 ti7 peng5-iu2 tau, peng5-iu2 ka7 i kim3. Chong2-si7 i su-khia toa3 jip8 lai5. Chit8 mi5 peng5-iu2 phiN7 tioh8 chhau3-hoe2 lo, chiu7 chong5 jip8 i e5 khun3-pang5, khoaN3 i ti7 hoe2-lou5 piN hou7 hoe2 sio, m7 chai i sou2 cho3. Ho2 kai-chai3 hit pai2 hou7 lang5 kiu3. Chiu7 koh to3 khi3 chhin-lang5 tau. Chhin-lang5 koh ka7 i kim3 chiu2, i kan-khou2 kau3 kek8. U7 chit8 jit8 kap chhin-lang5 teh kiaN5-lou7, chiu7 siam2 soa3 thiau3 loh8 Lun5-tun ho5 si2. Oa2 40 hoe3 na7-tiaN7. Li2 teh kong2: Goa2 eng2 m7 cho3 chui3-han3. Bo5 tek-khak chai. Chit hang7 thang chai, chiu7-si7 hit e5 lang5 na7 long2 bo5 chiah8 chiu2, chiu7 i m7 bian2 cho3 chui3-han3 si2, che si7 u7 iaN2.
